alert.note: Alert for South Central Oregon Coast (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 10 at 1:28AM PST until March 10 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Near to slightly below freezing temperatures as low as 28 degrees expected. * WHERE...Freeze conditions are expected for much of Coos and coastal Douglas counties, including Coos Bay, North Bend, Coquille, Myrtle Point, and Powers. Frost is expected for the remaining areas along the immediate coast, including Reedsport, Lakeside, Charleston, Bandon, and Port Orford. * WHEN...From 2 AM to 9 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
